t: Amazon, Roomba-parent iRobot abandon $1.4 billion merger deal | Reuters
s: January 29, 2024 - Amazon and robot vacuum maker iRobot said Monday they would end their plans to merge in the face of opposition from EU and U.S. antitrust regulators.

t: Amazon and iRobot sign an agreement for Amazon to acquire iRobot
s: August 5, 2022 - Amazon will acquire iRobot for $61 per share in an all-cash transaction valued at approximately $1.7 billion, including iRobot's net debt. Completion of the transaction is subject to customary closing conditions, including approval by iRobot's shareholders and regulatory approvals.

t: Amazon abandons $1.4 billion deal to buy Roomba maker iRobot | The Verge
s: January 29, 2024 - Amazon’s $1.4 billion deal to buy iRobot is off, iRobot CEO Colin Angle is stepping down, and the Roomba maker will lay off 350 people, or about 31 percent of its workforce.

t: Amazon to acquire Roomba robot vacuum maker iRobot for $1.7 billion | The Verge
s: August 5, 2022 - Amazon has signed a deal to acquire the robot vacuum company iRobot for $1.7 billion, adding Roomba to its smart home portfolio along with Alexa, Eero, Ring, Blink, and its own Astro robot.

t: Amazon and iRobot agree to terminate pending acquisition - Jan 29, 2024

t: Amazon's bid to buy Roomba maker iRobot is called off amid pushback in Europe | AP News
s: January 29, 2024 - Amazon has called off its purchase of iRobot, blaming "undue and disproportionate regulatory hurdles" after the European Union signaled its objection to the deal.
